sub_title: 8 years experience working in all round accounting role with many type of business. I was working inside at the office and outside at the clients' place with the difference accounting software.
summary:
As an ambitious accountant, I am always passionate about developing my career for the future best. My
qualification can further be proven by the fact that am accredited holder of Bachelor of accountancy degree.
Besides, having worked for over 8 years in Thai accounting firm and Japanese accounting firm from Thailand, I
share a wealth of experience in compiling and analyzing accurate financial reports and data.  
About moved from abroad, I recently moved from Thailand to live with my Dutch husband in the Netherlands, I'm allow to work here and employer doesn't have to sponsor me visa & work permit.

profile_positions.location: กรุงเทพมหานคร, กรุงเทพมหานคร, ประเทศไทย
profile_positions.description:
All round Accounting and Finance as below 
-Managed and independently completed company payrolls, invoices, VAT and other expenses.
-Managed and planning company monthly expenses budget.
-Issued Payment voucher and pay on due.
-Monitor overall accounting (AR, AP, GL, Fixed Asset, VAT and Taxation)
-Monthly income reconcile with bank report (Restaurant business).
-Prepared monthly tax (VAT and Withholding tax) and submitted to revenue department.
-Balancesheet Reconcile
-Generated monthly, quarterly financial reports to detail company revenues and expenses
-Monthly cash audit at the store branches.
profile_positions.title: Accounting Executive

company.name: Account Porter Co., Ltd. (Japanese Accounting Firm)

profile_positions.location: กรุงเทพมหานคร, กรุงเทพมหานคร, ประเทศไทย
profile_positions.company: Account Porter Co., Ltd. (Japanese Accounting Firm)
profile_positions.description:
All round Accounting as below 
-Bookkeeping 
-Balance sheet reconcile and recheck GL
-Generated financial statements documenting revenue, expenses and liabilities.
-Posted journal and ledger entries, prepared financial statements and reports and closed books.
-Used accounting software to perform bookeeping, invoicing and bank reconciliations.
-Prepared monthly tax (VAT and Withholding tax) and submitted to revenue department.
-Calculated, prepared and filed payroll taxes for clients.
-Generated monthly, quarterly financial reports to detail company revenues and expenses.
-Prepared yearly report and reviewed submitted documentation with auditors.
-Maintained robust financial records for business for regulatory reporting and taxation.
-Drafted periodic profit and loss reports to analyse trends and project future changes.
-Communicated with internal and external auditors to coordinate scheduled audits and compliance reviews.
-Managed year-end processes to calculate and return accurate tax amounts to Revenue department.
-Advised clients on required operational changes necessary for tax legislation compliance.
-Training and mentored junior staff members with constructive feedback and actionable steps for performance
improvement.
profile_positions.title: Senior Accounting
